text: 11.26 Hib 10.34-35, 13.13 Ne God tap teplep yɨbɨl ñek dɨnɨgayn agɨl pelpel nep gos nɨgolɨgup. Anɨb ak tek, Yijip binɨb tap teplep yɨbɨl kɨli okok, tap yokɨp yek yɨp tep ma gup agɨl gos nɨgak. Yad pen Bɨ God nop aglup ak nop chɨgen yɨp agjuwɨl gɨ tɨmel gɨnɨgabal ak, tep yɨbɨl yek yɨp tep gup agɨl gos nɨgak.
